project.name: |-- 002-member-inner-classes
project.description:
Keywords: + Member Inner Classes
This project includes a couple of very simple examples involving static nested classes:
MemberInnerClassTest1: Demonstrates how to instantiate a Member Inner Class.
MemberInnerClassTest2: Demonstrates how you can hide your implementation using member inner classes. In particular, by declaring the inner class as private a client programmer will never have access to the implementation.
The classes include simple runners that can be executed as java programs.
